Reviews.Title: Phone is very good looking, functional. Slightly misleading memory spec.
Reviews.Author: Steven A. Hanifl "stahs"
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying this phone very much. To pay under 200 dollars for a Re-branded One X is quite a nice treat. A word about the 16 GB memory on the phone... Only 2 GB is available for apps! While this is not a small amount compared to many mid or low range phones, I was quite surprised that this was the case here.... 9 GB was available on a separate partition of the same memory, so frankly HTC was just underestimating power users' demand.That said,  App2Sd simplifies the process of moving many apps to the other partition, and I have yet to run out of space. The screen is a beauty, and this phone is a runway model in terms of looks, it is beautiful yet refined. The kickstand should be a standard feature on all phones, it is very handy. The memory card slot can actually take certain makes of 64 GB sdhc cards so do a search.The battery is average, and cannot be removed. However, aggressive power management sorts this out... Provided you are careful about the apps you install, for instance Skype is notorious for halving battery time. If you actually let the battery trickle charge from 85 percent to 100 you will see an overall increase in battery capacity after a few charges.The 4.7 inch screen is great to type on and looks gorgeous, in public this phone doubles your wow factor. The wifi is dual band, 5ghz has good range, and the phone does a good job for a phone of holding signal, and negotiation for bit rate. Since phones are limited by their size I suspect wifi signal will always be more problematic than tablets or laptops... This phone does well for its form factor.I have been pleasantly surprised by this phone, This was going to be a stopgap phone as I tried out Ting, I will probably not upgrade as soon as I had planned, I have no need.Two updates in the comments section.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Zakary Goodmanson
Reviews.Content: This phone runs well and has had no issues so far. It is a nice phone. It is a good phone.

Reviews.Title: Best affordable phone in 2014!
Reviews.Author: Tigger
Reviews.Content: No doubt about it. It has great camera quality. The price is very very affordable. The processor is the same as Samsung S3, but costs you way less if you buy the HTC phone. Google this item for review. It has high reviews from various sites.

Reviews.Title: HTC 4g lte
Reviews.Author: Cristy
Reviews.Content: Phone came remarkably fast. Came with all the paper work they said it would and then some. If I need another phone for the wife, will be buying from these people.

Reviews.Title: Equine perfection
Reviews.Author: Wascar Santos
Reviews.Content: Perhaps the most beautiful phone ever, and one of the most functional, I find fault in this phone and recommend it to anyone who wants to have a phone that feels like a Ferrari.

Reviews.Title: thank you!! :)
Reviews.Author: nikki stephens
Reviews.Content: Super Fast shipping which was awesome. Works really awesome most of the time. Seems to have an issue with the microphone. Works great for a while then the mic stops working and I can only talk on speakerphone. Then that stops and I can only talk regularly. Keeps going back and forth.

Reviews.Title: Has its issues, but a great phone overall
Reviews.Author: Matthew G
Reviews.Content: OK- In the interest of full disclosure I purchased my EVO refurbished (not off this listing) but I imagine there should be little/no difference for points made on this review. I have had this phone for about 2.5 months.First, the summary- this phone is pretty great (for the price it is excellent). I switched from a Galaxy Aviator/Surge from US Cellular to this phone on Ting. I bought refurbished, so my price was closer to $125.The good: This phone is much larger than it feels- I hate the handfeel of the GS3/GS4- while this phone is not that large, the screen is very sizable but the phone still fits comfortably in the hand or pocket.Bloatware is at a minimum. HTC Sense reminds me of the ASUS Transformer UI for Android ICS- very clean and functional with nice polish.Processor is plenty snappy. Apps that hang or crash on my Transformer (Neverball, Vice City, FF6) all work great. I have also not yet needed to do any sort of task killing, even after leaving my phone on all week.The screen is gorgeous and ultra responsive, even with a screen protector.The phone has a rear speaker (Urgh), but the kickstand is very helpful for that. Sound is AMAZING on an external speaker or headphones (thank you Beats Audio).Battery life is decent. I am getting 2 days of regular use on one full charge. Though the battery is built in, it CAN be removed. It just takes more work.Camera is fast and takes good pictures. The video quality and sound are much more impressive. Comparing to my wife's Photon Q I really prefer my camera.The bad: The capacitive buttons are too sensitive and too close to the screen. I am constantly brushing the home button with the side of my thumb when using my phone on portrait mode.No HDMI port- every other smart device on my house has a micro hdmi jack so I refuse to purchase an HTC link. This would be a non issue except I have seen this phone advertised as having HDMI out support (referring, it turns out, to HTC link).No GPS on/off slider in settings. Annoying for the frequent geocacherbwho wants to conserve battery life. I am sure I could find a widget to do this, but that kind of defeats the battery saving purpose.Tinny speaker. Again, the kickstand helps, but the sound/volume is the same underwhelming experience you have come to accept with smart phones.The Micro USB jack is backwards. Cable goes in logo down. Don't break your phone trying to force the cable in.Some wifi hotspots take FOREVER to connect to, even when compared to other phones.The burst mode for the camera seems inconsistent with timing.So... All things considered, for the price and what it is (a non contract phone) I am impressed overall. If this phone was new from Sprint with a two year contract Iimagine the cons would have more weight.

Reviews.Title: Wow - 4G LTE for this price?
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Great phone - can't tell it was used at all.  It has been great so far - no issues at all.  As promised it was able to be turned on very quickly and easily on the Sprint network.

Reviews.Title: Good phone, but not without problems
Reviews.Author: Jason Oliver
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone to replace my optimus g that bugged out.  Phone arrived exactly as described and has worked phone.  It's a good phone and it seems just as snappy as the optimus g(which had a quad-core processor). My only real complaint is signal.  Especially lte, my galaxy s3 holds lte where the evo will drop to 3g.

Reviews.Title: phone was broken and no where in the add did the owner mention that.
Reviews.Author: Ron.Ron
Reviews.Content: Phone was broken and owner never mentioned that, any where in the add. Now I have to go through the hastle of sending it back and waiting to get my money refunded.

Reviews.Title: HTC makes nice phones
Reviews.Author: Bill "Gates"
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone from Droid Redux, condition was better than I had expected. Delivery was exceptionally fast the phone was packaged very well, sealed inside an anti-static bag and wrapped in thick bubble wrap. Micro usb cord, charger, and disc with user manual included in the box along with several papers with tips on starting the phone up and plenty of information regarding activation. It was evident the Seller was doing everything possible to make sure I received the phone in satisfactory condition.Immediately took it to a Sprint Store to have it activated and zero problems, using the phone and loving it. Overall excellent experience, would definitely recommend buying from this seller.

Reviews.Title: Really Like it.
Reviews.Author: Jason Jones
Reviews.Content: Came quickly and in very good condition. Really good interface and really nice display quality. Camera take nice pictures and texting is very smooth. Only complaints is that screen is just big enough (I have pretty big hands) to be a little awkward trying to reach everything with one hand. Also the home button is really close to the space bar when texting so it is easy to hit Home instead of space bar when texting. I bought the phone for its top of the line dual band wifi capabilities because I like to do a lot of wifi calling and it provides really good quality! Battery life is a little on the low end but not bad.

Reviews.Title: EVO 4GLTE
Reviews.Author: Sam H.
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone before and it was a joy to own. Before I had it activated, I had great use of it thru use of the Wi-Fi signal. I was able to communicate on my Gmail, internet social community sites,and download music, games and pictures! I had to replace it after I lost it carelessly. A great phone to use and own! I'm really glad I was able to purchase another one quite easily thru Amazon. Com.

Reviews.Title: its a phone you cant talk on
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: its a phone you can't use as a phone! The Mic doesn't work so can't make calls. And it doesn't charge half the time.

Reviews.Title: * BUYER BEWARE * UNETHICAL PRACTICES *
Reviews.Author: lee
Reviews.Content: first off the cell came on time but that was the only thing done right in this transaction! less than 48hrs after activation the phone threw an abnormal recovery from abnormal reset CODE NOTIFICATION , the mic wouldn't work so callers on other end couldn't hear me (VERY BAD FOR ME , I MAKE HUNDREDS OF CALLS /WEEK FOR MY WORK) , so i emailed the seller MobileSpree regarding issues , to NO AVAIL , I GOT NO RESPONSE (AT THAT TIME, MORE LATER ON THIS) . Callers could hear me w/BT device paired so i purchased headphones & bt until i could resolve & replace cell .So a day later i had enough and i left bad review/comments on Amazon regarding purchase , & I KID YOU NOT , WITHIN 5MIN MY PHONE RINGS , GUESS WHO , YEP IT WAS THE SELLER . (well i had to call him back from another phone cuz at this point bt device didnt work with cell either) BUT HE PROCEEDS TP TELL ME IT WAS AMAZONS FAULT HE DIDNT RECEIVE MY EMAIL A FEW DAYS EARLIER THAT THEY BEEN HAVING ISSUE WITH THE SYSTEM THAT HANDLES IT , HE PROMISED TO PERSONALLY HANDLE MY ISSUE AND HE WOULD PERSONALLY SEND ME GOOD REPLACEMENT CELL 1ST THING IN A.M. & NO NEED TO RETURN THE DEFECTIVE CELL ,,, ALL I HAD TO DO WAS REMOVE MY NEGATIVE REVIEW ON AMAZON , . HE TOLD ME HOW HE LOST HIS JOB 2 YEARS AGO AND AMAZON IS HOW HE FEEDS HIS FAMILY (3 KIDS 2 BOYS 1 GIRL) , SO I SAY OK MAN I WILL GIVE YOU A SHOT TO MAKE IT RIGHT , SO I FOLLOWED HIS INSTRUCTIONS ON REMOVING THE NEGATIVE REVIEW (HE MENTIONED ALSO THAT IF I DID'NT REMOVE IT , AMAZON WOULD HOLD HIS $) OK ANYHOW  ITS NEXT AFTERNOON SO I CALL HIM AND HE SAYS HE IS PERSONALLY TESTING CELL AT THAT MOMENT , ASKED ME TO GIVE HIM MY EMAIL SO HE COULD CONTACT ME DIRECTLY AND BYPASS AMAZON (BIG NO NO IN AMAZON GUIDELINES) IT WAS VERY SUSPICIOUS TO ME , SO I SAID NO JUST EMAIL ME THROUGH AMAZON AND TEXT AND EMAIL THE TRACK # FOR NEW CELL ...... OK LOW AND BEHOLD WHAT HAPPENS AT 3:30PM I GET A TEXT SAYING PHONE WAS ALSO ACTING UP AND SELLER HAS JUST SENT ME A REFUND CHECK!! EXCUSE ME MOBILESPREE ?????CHECK ?? I DO BUSINESS THROUGH AMAZON SECURE SITE ONLY , NO EXCEPTIONS !! BIG RED FLAG !! SO I NOTIFY AMAZON ASAP AND THEY TOOK EXCELLENT CARE OF ME , REFUNDING ALL MY EXPENSES . NEEDLESS TO SAY I WILL ONLY BE BUYING "AMAZON PRIME" PRODUCTS FROM NOW ON & ONLY PRODUCTS THAT ARE SOLD & SHIPPED BY AMAZON , ONLY !!TERRIBLE BUYING EXPERIENCE FROM MOBILE SPREE IF I COULD GIVE A LESS SCORE I WOULD DO SO !!** BUY WITH CAUTION , HIGH RATINGS DO NOT ALWAYS MEAN GOOD SELLER , AS YOU CAN SEE HOW HE NEGOTIATED HIS WAY OUT OF MY INITIAL NEG. REVIEW * BUYER BEWARE & ALWAYS CONTACT AMAZON QUICKLY AND DIRECTLY REGARDING ANY ISSUES , AMAZON WILL TAKE CARE OF THEIR CUSTOMERS THE RIGHT WAY !!
